channel.title: Can someone help me getting a ROM?
channel.description: Well, I was a huge fan of Time Splitters 2 for the Xbox/PS2 and I want to get back into it. I can't find a PC version and I don't want to buy another game and PS2 for $150 (I live in America). So I was wondering where I could find a good emulator and ROM for it. The real problem is the ROM, I know where to get the emulator, does anyone know a good website where I could find it? Thanks.
